html:
Dec 8 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including Abrdn, Air Liquide and Fluidra, on Wednesday.


HIGHLIGHTS

* Abrdn Plc ABDN.L: HSBC raises to buy from hold

* Air Liquide AIRP.PA: HSBC cuts to hold from buy

* Caixabank CABK.MC: Credit Suisse assumes coverage with neutral rating

* Fluidra SA FLUI.MC: Credit Suisse assumes coverage with outperform rating

* Infineon Technologies AG IFXGn.DE: JP Morgan cuts to neutral from overweight

Following is a summary of research actions on European companies reported by Reuters on Wednesday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.

* Abrdn Plc ABDN.L: HSBC raises to buy from hold
